amendment.description: Amendment revises Mineral Management Service royalty-in-kind procedures and allows payment for the transportation to wholesale market centers and processing of royalty production taken in kind.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 44 printed in the Congressional Record to limit the types of expenses eligible for reimbursement under the Mineral Management Service.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Maloney (NY) amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
